content.description: Researchers have found that women in the United States are twice as likely to develop clinical depression as men. One possible explanation for this difference is that women may be more likely to be encouraged to express their feelings and seek help from a mental health professional than are men.
content.question: Which of the following concepts provides the most likely explanation for this finding?

skill.text: 1.B: Explain how cultural norms, expectations, and circumstances, as well as cognitive biases apply to behavior and mental processes.
